So, I think all else equal, this more dovish Fed environment and these six cuts has the effect of taking a little bit of pressure off the reprice, especially product-level reprice. And that trajectory, I would expect to continue even in a lower rate environment. It's a pretty modest decline outlook consistent with the lower rates.
